definition: to roll up into a ball with one's hands/spiral/circle/variant of 團|团[tuan2]
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
lacking in cohesion and unity of purpose
Chen Tuan (871-989), a legendary Daoist sage

sentences.english: Blessed shall be thy basket and thy store.
sentences.chinese: 你的筐子和你的抟面盆都必蒙福。

sentences.english: Remember, I beseech thee, that thou hast made me as the clay; and wilt thou bring me into dust again?
sentences.chinese: 求你记念制造我如抟泥一般，你还要使我归于尘土吗？

sentences.english: His wife died after an agonizing three-year siege of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他的妻子和癌症抟斗三年后辞世。

sentences.english: Cursed shall be thy basket and thy store.
sentences.chinese: 17你的筐子和你的抟面盆都必受咒诅。

sentences.english: Your basket and your kneading trough will be blessed.
sentences.chinese: 5你的筐子和你的抟面盆都必蒙福。

definition: sack/tube open at both ends/(onom.) footsteps
variant of 皚皚|皑皑[ai2 ai2]
finely chopped meat or vegetables/powdered or fragmentary
